title: Did Donald Trump predict the conspiracy theory of "pizzaget " in an interview in 2011?
subtitle: Although Trump mentioned the word "pizzaget," there was no disagreement about the lunch meeting with Sarah Palin, not the conspiracy theory of the ring of child molesters.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Donald Trump referred to the theory of a conspiracy to sexualize children that became known as "Pizzagate" during an interview in 2011.
